pages.caption: The Sky Darkens — Hundreds of Speedy-Go drones in military formation.
Ace Descends — Corporate courier vs blue-collar contempt.
The Oath Circle — 'By our hands, the oath is sworn! For the sacred labor!'
The Localized Strike — Time stops outside. Golden union energy inside.
Under Siege — Drones smash against the golden barrier.
Breach — Spider drones squeeze through the mail slot. They're inside.
The Microwave EMP — Supervisor Ken's accidental moment of glory.
Level 42 Armor — Contract pages become plate armor. The union IS the shield.
Aftermath — Victory, but at a cost. The time freeze lifts.
'At least you're still here, old girl.' END.
